data.benefits: Scheme provides financial assistance for acquiring specific machinery/equipment up to maximum Rs. 1000 lakhs.
data.eligibility: All units which are located in north eastern region and wants to acquired machinery are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Equipment's/Machineries should be new. 
  2. In house fabrication of equipment's/machinery is not allowed. 
  3. Proposed unit for which financial assistance is sought should be located within any of the eight North-Eastern States and should in operation for a period of 5 years and making profit for the last three years.
data.beneficiaries: All units which are located in north eastern region and wants to acquired machinery are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Equipment's/Machineries should be new. 
  2. In house fabrication of equipment's/machinery is not allowed. 
  3. Proposed unit for which financial assistance is sought should be located within any of the eight North-Eastern States and should in operation for a period of 5 years and making profit for the last three years.
data.nodal_agency: North Eastern Development Finance Corporation Ltd.
data.context: This scheme to provide the financial assistance for acquiring specific machinery or equipment through financially sound and profit-making companies/producer companies/manufacturing units having a good credit record.
data.objective: To provide financial assistance for acquiring specific machinery/equipment by financially sound and profit making companies having good credit record.
data.description: Scheme provides Term loan of 70% percentage of cost of equipment plus taxes/duties, transportation and installation charges will be provided with minimum amount of Rs. 25 lakhs to  maximum up to Rs. 1000 lakhs.
data.how_to_apply: The applicants can apply through mentioned link : https://www.nedfi.com/loan-apply-form/
data.funding_facilitator: North Eastern Development Finance Corporation Limited
data.funding_mechanism: Funds/Incentives will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority
data.additional_info: Repayment period will be 6 years including moratorium or as stipulated by the sanctioning authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Photo identity and Address proof : As per RBI defined KYC guidelines.
Business Proof : Trade License/MOA & AOA/GST Registration/ITR, Partnership Deed etc. as per applicability.
Additional documents may be collected during the loan application process as per actual requirement.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: EDFi House, G. S. Road, Dispur, Guwahati,Assam Pin - 781006
Ph : +91-361-222 2200
Fax : +91-361-223 7733 / 7734
Mail : mail@nedfi.com
data.location: Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland and Tripura
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Industry  - All Entities  - North Eastern States  - All MSMEs, All Non MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale  - Up
